msg: Improved recovery from JSP syntax errors, particularly in cases of
No regressions in watchdog jsp test were detected.

author: rubys
msg: The JSP container generates invalid Java code from JSP pages if
multiple pages are being accessed for the first time at roughly the
same time. This results in a compilation error.

author: bergsten
msg: Changed putHeader to addHeader when setting cookies to allow more than one cookie in a response

author: rubys
msg: Fix "Nasty bug in Tomcat prevents Cocoon operation" as reported by
Fix does not introduce any regressions in any watchdog jsp, watchdog
servlet, or jakarta runtest on Windows/JDK1.1.8 or Linux/JDK1.2.2.
